bill_title: Commending the South Dakota Air National Guard's 114th Fighter Wing for being awarded the Distinguished Flying Unit Plaque, the William W. Spruance Safety Award, the Winston P. Wilson Trophy, and the Major General John J. Pesch Flight Safety Trophy in training year 2022.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending the South Dakota Air National Guard's 114th Fighter Wing for being awarded the Distinguished Flying Unit Plaque, the William W. Spruance Safety Award, the Winston P. Wilson Trophy, and the Major General John J. Pesch Flight Safety Trophy in training year 2022. WHEREAS, the South Dakota Air National Guard's 114th Fighter Wing was awarded the Distinguished Flying Unit Plaque by the National Guard Association of the United States for being one of the top five flying units in the nation during the 2022 training year; and WHEREAS, the South Dakota Air National Guard's 114th Fighter Wing was awarded the Major General John J. Pesch Flight Safety Award by the National Guard Association of the United States for being one of the top two flying units, and was judged to have demonstrated the highest standards of flight safety in the nation during the 2022 training year; and WHEREAS, the South Dakota Air National Guard's 114th Fighter Wing was awarded the William W. Spruance Safety Award by the National Guard Association of the United States for making the most significant contribution to accident prevention in the nation during the 2022 training year; and WHEREAS, the South Dakota Air National Guard's 114th Fighter Wing was awarded the Winston P. Wilson Trophy by the National Guard Association of the United States for being the top fighter jet unit in the nation during the 2022 training year: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the South Dakota Air National Guard's 114th Fighter Wing, in its 2022 training year, has received the prestigious Distinguished Flying Unit Plaque, Major General John J. Pesch Flight Safety Award, William W. Spruance Safety Award, and Winston P. Wilson Trophy, for its outstanding commitment to the safety of its members and for its dedicated service to the state and to the nation.
